SEARCH
Package io.github.jspinak.brobot.datatypes.project

Class Button

java.lang.Object
io.github.jspinak.brobot.datatypes.project.Button
public class Button extends Object
Represents a UI button configuration for the desktop runner that calls automation functions.

  • Method Details

    • copy

      public Button copy()
      Creates a copy of this button configuration.
      Returns:
      A new button with the same configuration

    • getParametersAsMap

      public Map<String,Object> getParametersAsMap()
      Gets the parameters as a Map for easier manipulation. Only works if parameters is a Map or can be cast to a Map.
      Returns:
      The parameters as a Map or an empty Map if parameters is null or not a Map
